segments.text: Hello , I'd like to reserve a hotel room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That should be no problem . May I have your full name , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hello , Mr . Sandals . My name is Michelle . What days do you need that reservation , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm planning to visit New York from Friday , April 14 until Monday , April 17 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our room rates recently went up . Is that okay with you , Mr . Sandals ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much per night are we talking about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful ! Do you prefer a smoking or nonsmoking room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next question , Is a queen-size bed okay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , Mr . Sandals . Your reservation is in our computer . All we need now is a phone number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , Mr . Sandals . We look forward to seeing you in New York !
segments.speaker: S2
